```{r}

    comment = "#>",
    fig.align = "center",
    fig.show = "hold",
    fig.path = "figs/",
    fig.width = 6,
    fig.asp = 0.618,
    fig.retina = 3,
    out.width = "70%"
)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

Generate 2 plots and show in one row:

```{r}
#| out-width: "50%"
#| fig-align: "default"
#| layout-ncol: 2
ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = drv))

ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = drv, shape = drv)) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")
```
